Text:
I am having trouble getting this onto my hdd. I have tried wiibackupmanager and WBFS. Any suggestions?
Thanks
Thankee. What is a scrubbed file and how do you shrink the games??

@altrego99 Wii game discs have a 'junk' area to make a disc a certain size. Not all games take up the whole disc so the junk. A scrubbed game is just the game without the junk area so this is a shrinked Wii game.
